DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Illicit Tobacco Product Illicit Tobacco Product Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._A product containing or derived from tobacco that is not compliant with legislative requirements._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
